title: 刚刚做那个生态园建一圈玻璃累死朕了 200X200！！！！！！！！！！
author: mamadai

replies.author: 阿有
replies.txt_content: 怎么不用创世神呢。。

replies.author: 工总司
replies.txt_content: 用指令多好……

replies.author: nixgnot
replies.txt_content: 听说过WE吗少年

replies.author: 幼猫
replies.txt_content:
没有WE的话先建四根柱子
然后按着右键不放对着柱子向后后退

replies.author: licrafter
replies.txt_content: 生态圈想法不错，模拟一个生态环境

replies.author: zhao55052
replies.txt_content: 200x200的话不用/fill命令确实累

replies.author: darrksy
replies.txt_content: 强行手撸装逼。。。不错不错，下次来个2000*2000的

replies.author: yxs807897225
replies.txt_content: 我是建筑渣，看到好建筑我就想毁掉！！！

replies.author: 镜钥钥
replies.txt_content: 那就别建了，好好玩生存

replies.txt_content: 没有创世神的悲剧，记住了。。。。
